hobbies.Gym: I try to routinely go to the gym if I have time. I had a phase back in UCLA where I would go 5 times a week for 3 months, that before the pandemic though.
hobbies.Gaming: I do some competitive gaming on my spare time. I mainly play Valorant now. I used to play CSGO and League of Legends, and even Mobile Legends, but my priorities and other interests outweigh my hobbies so I only stick to one game now.
hobbies.Basketball: My favorite sport, although I'm not good at it. I enjoy playing recreationally from time to time.

interests.Investing: I like the idea of investing. The power of compound interest is often underestimated. It doesn't take as much time to plan your investments, but it can lead to big results.
interests.Cryptocurrencies: I have always been intrigued by the idea of Cryptocurrencies. I think that it has a significant potential to be adopted, which is why I also invest in crypto, namely: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Cardano.
interests.Coding: I like the idea of being able to create your own Software. Technology still has a lot of room to grow, and I want to be able to understand its potential and be a part of it, which is why I chose to code.
